R0080.title: Device Malware Infection
R0080.definition: Malware or trojans infiltrate an organization's internal network through employee devices or accounts, potentially stealing sensitive information, monitoring operations, or damaging systems.
R0080.description: Scenarios may include employees clicking malicious links, downloading trojan-infected attachments, or being tricked through social engineering, causing malware to enter the internal network.
R0080.influence: Harms include sensitive data leakage, network service disruption, damage to information assets, and potential financial losses.
